description.value:
Trigger You begin to Cast a Spell that requires at least 2 actions to cast.

You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield. You @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Step]{Step}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Leap]{Leap}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Stand]{Stand}. This action can be before or after you Cast the Spell.
